name: SGD300 Prototype #5: WallRunner
description:
This WallRunner prototype is a first person 3D platformer that drew inspiration from the Mirror's Edge and Titanfall series', which I built using a combination of video tutorials, online guides, and good ol' fashioned trial and error. This project features a wall running mechanic and a grapple mechanic developed using Blueprints.

This game was developed as part of assessment for USC course SGD300 Experimental Games Programming.
